text: The student will construct sets of step-by-step instructions (algorithms) both independently and collaboratively
subject: Computer Science (2017)
subs: using loops (a wide variety of patterns such as repeating patterns or growing patterns); and

text: The student will construct programs to accomplish tasks as a means of creative expression using a block based programming language or unplugged activities, both independently and collaboratively
subject: Computer Science (2017)
subs: using loops (a wide variety of patterns, such as repeating patterns or growing patterns); and

text: The student will analyze, correct, and improve (debug) an algorithm that includes sequencing and simple loops, with or without a computing device.
subject: Computer Science (2017)

text: The student will plan and create a design document to illustrate thoughts, ideas, and stories in a sequential (step-by-step) manner (e.g., story map, storyboard, sequential graphic organizer).
subject: Computer Science (2017)

text: The student will compare and contrast a group of items based on the attributes or actions of each item, with or without a computing device.
subject: Computer Science (2017)

text: The student will acknowledge that materials are created by others (e.g., author, illustrator, and website).
subject: Computer Science (2017)
